com.google.code.gwt.crop.client

Interface ICropperStyleSource


  • public interface ICropperStyleSource
    Interface is used to give different styles for different device types. Actual implementation could be defined through the deferred binding.
    Author:
    ilja.hamalainen@gmail.com (Ilja Hämäläinen)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CropperStyleResource css()
      Initiates proper implementation of the current style bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • css

        CropperStyleResource css()

        Initiates proper implementation of the current style bundle.

        Create inner interface extending ClientBundle with one single method, that returns the CropperStyleResource type. Add the @Source("yourStyleFileName.css") annotation to this method to provide path to your CSS file.

        Returns:
        GWTCropperStyle instance of the ClientBundle style, annotated with your own CSS file name.
        See Also:
        StylesDesktopImpl.java as an example
